title: Breakingviews TV: Female factor
text:
Breakingviews TV: Female factor 6:06pm BST - 03:41
The workforces of Apple, Google and Facebook are lopsided in men’s favor. Males make up roughly 70 percent. To get to gender parity will take up to 15 years. Richard Beales and Jennifer Saba discuss the various necessary targets to get there. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The workforces of Apple, Google and Facebook are lopsided in men’s favor. Males make up roughly 70 percent. To get to gender parity will take up to 15 years. Richard Beales and Jennifer Saba discuss the various necessary targets to get there.
